name: tag-regulator
description: Normalize and infer Zotero tags under a strict controlled vocabulary file.

prompts.gemini: 调用名为 tag-regulator 的SKILL。file输入：valid_tags={{ input.valid_tags }}。inline输入：metadata={{ input.metadata }}, input_tags={{ input.input_tags }}。参数：valid_tags_format={{ parameter.valid_tags_format }}, infer_tag={{ parameter.infer_tag }}。严格按 tag-regulator/SKILL.md 执行，stdout 只能输出一个 JSON 对象。
prompts.codex: You are $tag-regulator. File input: valid_tags={{ input.valid_tags }}. Inline inputs: metadata={{ input.metadata }}, input_tags={{ input.input_tags }}. Parameters: valid_tags_format={{ parameter.valid_tags_format }}, infer_tag={{ parameter.infer_tag }}. Follow tag-regulator/SKILL.md strictly and print exactly one JSON object to stdout.
